metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2190 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description:
Moodle through 2.6.11, 2.7.x before 2.7.13, 2.8.x before 2.8.11, 2.9.x before 2.9.5, and 3.0.x before 3.0.3 does not properly restrict links, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive URL information by reading a Referer log.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-2190` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.7.13+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.7.13+dfsg-1').
